Logging the games events provide useful data for analysis of game sessions to make them more engaging and fun.
It is also useful for teachers to monitor ongoing session.
Learners did use redesigned hint system and recommended solutions. Evidence found in collected game events and the supplemental user survey.
Learners answers neither confirm nor disprove the benefit of the hints and solutions used.
